application.name: 微信客服
application.description: 实现微信高级客服接口以及客服管理功能
application.author: Bin,by大路货Modify

manifest.install: CREATE TABLE `ims_lxy_wecs` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `workid` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `start_time` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `end_time` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `csid` text, `busy` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=35 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
